title: New client :(
body: Every time I get into queue, draft that is, my computer lags out when it's my turn to ban, so I keep having endless wait time. I never had this problem with the old client. I can't even play anymore? This sucks man... ðŸ˜’

replies.body: When you join matchmaking and go into champion select, your connection needs to transition you over with everyone else.  It sounds like a connection issue might be causing you to lose sync and get left behind.  I recommend going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
